name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Mamelucos a la Romana
name_original: Mortadelo y Filemón: Mamelucos a la Romana
description:
In this new adventure by Alcachofa, a sequel to 'Balones y Patadones,' Mort and Phil must travel to Rome, where the dangerous mafia boss Vito Corvino is hiding, wanted by the FBI (accused of misappropriation of furniture from the White House) and the CESID.

Local multiplayer option in which each player controls one of the two characters. Use the Zapatófono to communicate with your friends!

A great point & click adventure where you can control Mort or Phil according to your preferences: switch between characters and choose who will perform each action.
